title: Il Pavone Nero - Voodoo Sexy 1975 ITA-ESP Sub ENG Hardcore Versi
description:
TITLE: Il Pavone Nero
AKA: Voodoo Sexy - The Black Peacock - Pavo Real Negro
YEAR: 1975

One of the most unknown and rare italian sexploitation-films, released in two versions, normal and hardcore with explicit sex scenes, starring Karin Schubert, Chris Avram, Don Powell, Franco Ressel, Luigi Angelillo, Rita Orlando and Samantha Star.
Santo Domingo 1973, an Italian engineer arrives from Milan to inspect the construction of a dam, since its predecessor, engineer Kluge, has disappeared without a trace.
At one point the engineer and his wife Laura are involved in the mysterious voodoo rituals led by Balaga, a sorcerer contrary to the construction of the dam. Meanwhile, the ghost of Kluge warns the engineer to carry out the work.

WARNING: This version contains explicit sex scenes.
